mapper.select: SELECT substr(scontent,1,10) as scontent, sns_tbl.* FROM sns_tbl where mpk = #{mpk} order by spk desc
select * from snsFile_tbl where sfpk in (select min(sfpk) from snsFile_tbl group by spk) and spk = #{spk}
mapper.update: UPDATE sns_tbl SET stitle=#{stitle}, scontent=#{scontent}, stag=#{stag}, ssort=#{ssort} WHERE spk=#{spk}
mapper.select: SELECT m.mpk,m.mname,p.ppk,nvl(p.pfile,'mu.jpg') as pfile, nvl(p.ppath,'WEB-INF/views/upload/profile') as ppath FROM ASTMember m, ASTProfile p WHERE m.mpk=p.mpk(+) and m.mpk=#{mpk } order by ppk desc
SELECT m.mpk, m.mid, m.mname, p.ppk, nvl(p.pfile,'mu.jpg') AS pfile, nvl(p.ppath,'WEB-INF/views/upload/profile') AS ppath FROM ASTMember m, ASTProfile p WHERE m.mpk=p.mpk(+) AND m.mname LIKE #{mname}
SELECT * FROM sns_tbl where mpk = #{mpk} and ssort = #{ssort}

select rt.*, nvl(af.pfile,'mu.jpg') as pfile ,nvl(af.ppath,'mu.jpg') as ppath, am.mname, am.mid from ASTMember am, ASTProfile af, reply_tbl rt where am.mpk=af.mpk(+) and am.mpk=rt.mpk and spk=#{spk} order by rpk desc
mapper.update: UPDATE sns_tbl SET shits=shits+1 WHERE spk=#{spk}
mapper.select: select count(*) as ct from ASTMember am,ASTProfile af,reply_tbl rt where am.mpk=af.mpk(+) and am.mpk=rt.mpk and spk=#{spk}
mapper.update: update reply_tbl set rcontent=#{rcontent},rtime=sysdate where rpk=#{rpk}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum rnum, a.* FROM( select rt.*, nvl(af.pfile,'mu.jpg') as pfile ,nvl(af.ppath,'mu.jpg') as ppath, am.mname, am.mid from ASTMember am, ASTProfile af, reply_tbl rt where am.mpk=af.mpk(+) and am.mpk=rt.mpk and spk=#{spk} order by rpk desc ) a )WHERE rnum between #{start} and #{end}
SELECT ab.mname FROM ASTMember ab,sns_tbl st where ab.mpk=st.mpk and st.spk=#{spk}
